name: Dungeon Cleaner (vanillaspace)
description:
Dungeon Cleaner is a dungeon crawler, hack n slash! 

You have been banished from a warrior clan and now work as a dungeon cleaner for hire.

Pick up your weapon and get ready to get rid of unwanted guests!
_________________________________________________________________________

Controls

  • Movement - W A S D
  • Abilities - Arrow Keys
  • Exit - ESC Key

_________________________________________________________________________

Gift Jam Entry

I wanted to prototype character abilities and experiment with material manipulation. The game logic was made from scratch. 

Sounds, UI assets & 3D assets were free online - most available in Unreal Store Free Market or FreeSound.

  • Level Design & Props
    • Medieval Dungeon in Environments
  • Models
    • Paragon: Khaimera in Epic Content
    • Infinity Blade: Warriors in Epic Content
    • Infinity Blade: Adversaries in Epic Content
  • Sounds
    • Action RPG
  • Textures
    • Material Function Collection in Materials
  • VFX
    • FX Variety Pack in Visual Effects

_________________________________________________________________________

Team

This smol prototype was made by Vanillaspace, consisting of me, myself, and I!

_________________________________________________________________________
